tiers.foundation_content: Content is split into six teaching topics B1-B6 and a practical activity skills topic B7. Paper 1 assesses content from Topics B1–B3 and B7. Paper 2 assesses content from Topics B4–B6 and B7, with assumed knowledge of Topics B1–B3.
tiers.higher_content: Content is split into six teaching topics B1-B6 and a practical activity skills topic B7. Paper 3 assesses content from Topics B1–B3 and B7. Paper 4 assesses content from Topics B4–B6 and B7, with assumed knowledge of Topics B1–B3.
differences: Statements shown in bold type will only be tested in the Higher Tier papers. All other statements will be assessed in both Foundation and Higher Tier papers.

main_sections: Topic B5: Genes, inheritance and selection
content_overview.organization: Content is divided into topics B1-B6 and a practical skills topic B7, with each topic further divided into sub-topics.

analysis.extraction_guidance: Focus on extracting topic-based content and assessment structure, ensuring to capture tier differences and cross-component content.
